docs.snippet: Thanks in part to social media, the casual fan is taking an active interest in how equine athletes are treated. Their concerns are compelling some forces within the sport to make reforms....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thanks in part to social media, the casual fan is taking an active interest in how equine athletes are treated. Their concerns are compelling some forces within the sport to make reforms.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column applauds casual racing fans for taking active interest in how equine athletes are treated; say their concerns have compelled some forces within industry to make reforms with regards to doping and other issues.

headline.main: A Push to Improve Welfare of Horse Racing’s Involuntary Heroes
headline.print_headline: A Push to Improve the Welfare of a Sport’s Involuntary Heroes

docs.lead_paragraph: The influential sportswriter and commentator, who was fired from ESPN after making incendiary remarks concerning the National Football League, begins a new show on HBO on June 22.
docs.abstract: Jim Rutenberg Mediator column examines story behind dispute between ESPN and sportswriter and commentator Bill Simmons; notes Simmons, since being fired from ESPN for criticizing NFL commissioner Roger Goodell, has secured HBO show Any Given Wednesday; reflects on how media organizations that depend on NFL for ratings handle criticism of league.

headline.main: Bill Simmons Prepares to Stand Up to Sports Incorporated

docs.snippet: When the Pittsburgh Penguins won the Stanley Cup in 2009, a dynasty appeared to be in the offing. It didn't quite work out that way. Injuries and inconsistent postseason play sent the franchise into a full-fledged identity crisis....

headline.main: Cup Winners Again, Penguins Have Shot at Lengthy Run at Top
headline.print_headline: Cup Winners Again, Penguins Have Shot at Lengthy Run at Top

docs.snippet: In a story June 13 about assault weapons like the one used by the Orlando nightclub gunman, The Associated Press reported erroneously the precise type of weapon used by the shooter. The gunman was armed with a Sig Sauer MCX assault rifle, not an A...
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story June 13 about assault weapons like the one used by the Orlando nightclub gunman, The Associated Press reported erroneously the precise type of weapon used by the shooter. The gunman was armed with a Sig Sauer MCX assault rifle, not an AR-15, which is a similar model.

docs.snippet: From across the world, officials and public figures are expressing condemnation and shock over the Florida mass shooting at the Pulse Orlando nightclub on Sunday, when police say a gunman wielding an assault-type rifle opened fire, killing at leas...
docs.lead_paragraph: From across the world, officials and public figures are expressing condemnation and shock over the Florida mass shooting at the Pulse Orlando nightclub on Sunday, when police say a gunman wielding an assault-type rifle opened fire, killing at least 49 people and wounding dozens.

headline.main: Across the World, Shock and Condemnation at Orlando Massacre
headline.print_headline: Across the World, Shock and Condemnation at Orlando Massacre
